text:
COMMITTEE ON SCIENTIFIC AIDS TO LEARNING
COMMITTEE OF NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL
41 EAST 42ND STREET, NEW YORK, N.Y.
Telephone: Murray Hill 2-8352
James B. Conant, Chairman
Vannevar Bush
Ross G. Harrison
Frank B. Jewett
Bethuel M. Webster
Ben D. Wood
July 6, 1940
Irvin Stewart, Director
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois.
Dear Mr* Schooley:
Thanks for your note of June 29th.
I have tried to obtain more information on this motor
from the Universal Microphone Company. They are so cagy
in their replies that I suspect they do not believe that
most of their motors would be as good as the one in the
recorder which you tested.
Very truly yours.
Irvin Stewart
Director.
